  • Method Details

    • applyCSSPropertyMargin

      void applyCSSPropertyMargin(Object element, CSSValue value, String pseudo, CSSEngine engine) throws Exception
      A shorthand property for setting all four margins in one declaration. Available values are {margin-top, margin-right, margin-bottom, margin-left}
      Throws:
      Exception
